skills.name: Active
skills.description:
(Test V2)
[SP: 0][CD: 16s] Blasts the ground with star explosion, deal 800% + 200% ATK of Fire DMG to enemies in an aoe and add [Blazing] on te traget for 10s, enemies with [Blazing] receive 15% more Fire DMG. When equipped by Spina Astera, when you inflict Starfire on enemies with [Blazing], deal 10% ATK Fire DMG.

skills.name: Passive 1
skills.description:
(Test V2)
Self Basic ATK(including Combo, Charge) gain Fire DMG +20% against enemies in [Blazing] state. When equipped by Spina Astera, while off-field, recover 40 star meter per second.
